programs.title: Wedding Ceremony
programs.description: We exchange our vows and tie the knot amidst the beauty of St Marry's Church.

programs.title: Appetizers & Drinks
programs.description: Mingle over appetizers and refreshing drinks, setting the tone for an evening of celebration.

programs.title: Dinner Service
programs.description: A gourmet dinner service offering a culinary journey, tailored to indulge the senses and honor the occasion.
